verbose_text: Glucocorticoids (GCs) such as betamethasone or dexamethasone are routinely used as an effective anti-inflammatory therapy for chronic inflammatory diseases such as asthma because they are immunesuppressive and so inhibit many of the initial events in the inflammatory response.
evidence: GCs) such as betamethasone or dexamethasone are routinely used as an effective anti-inflammatory therapy for chronic inflammatory diseases such as asthma because they are immunesuppressive and so inhibit many of the initial events in the inflammatory response
